Description.Text:
Property Location
Fraser Suites Queens Gate is centrally located in London, walking distance from London Natural History Museum and close to Royal Albert Hall. This 4-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Victoria and Albert Museum and Harrods.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 105 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a terrace. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby.


Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

London Natural History Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Imperial College London - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
London Science Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Royal Albert Hall - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Victoria and Albert Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi

Brompton Oratory - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

Kensington Palace - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Harrods - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Kensington Gardens - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Hyde Park - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Saatchi Gallery - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Sloane Square - 1.6 km / 1 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 16 km / 9.9 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 18.8 km / 11.7 mi

The preferred airport for Fraser Suites Queens Gate is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
